messages.subject: Asai and Shibata
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone know what the relations between Asai Nagamasa and Shibata Katsuie were other than the fact that they were both married to Oda s sister, Odani
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone know what the relations between Asai Nagamasa and Shibata Katsuie
were other than the fact that they were both married to Oda's sister, Odani
noKata?

Tim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
